      • areaTriggersByLocation

        protected Map<SimpleChunkLocation,Map<Area,AreaTrigger>> areaTriggersByLocation

      • entityLocationMap

        protected final Map<UUID,SimpleLocation> entityLocationMap
        The child class should update this map with its own way. Though, the entity which garbage-corrected will be also deleted from this map automatically. Adding or removing from this map also has to be reflected in entityTrackMap as well

      • entityTrackMap

        protected final Map<UUID,WeakReference<IEntity>> entityTrackMap
        The actual entity map. Adding or removing from this map also has to be reflected in entityLocationMap as well

      • getAreaForLocation

        protected List<Map.Entry<Area,AreaTrigger>> getAreaForLocation(SimpleLocation sloc)
        Get list of all Area Triggers containing this sloc.
        Parameters:
        sloc -
        Returns:
        list of Entries containing the given sloc. It may be empty but never null.

      • getConflictingAreas

        public Set<Area> getConflictingAreas(Area area,
                                     Predicate<Area> filter)
        get all the area that is conflicting with given area. This does not include the area itself. It's quite a CPU intensive work; use it wisely
        Parameters:
        area -
        filter - decide what it means by 'conflict' between the given area and other areas
        Returns:
        never be null; can be empty if no conflicts are found

      • createArea

        public boolean createArea(String name,
                          SimpleLocation smallest,
                          SimpleLocation largest)
        Create a new Area Trigger.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Area Trigger.
        smallest - smallest point (ex. 0,0,0)
        largest - largest point(ex. 15,15,15)
        Returns:
        true on success; false if exact same area (same smallest and largest) already exist.

      • setupArea

        protected void setupArea(AreaTrigger trigger)
        reset the area cache. Should be called on reload or on Area Trigger created.
        Parameters:
        trigger -

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • deleteArea

        @Deprecated
public boolean deleteArea(SimpleLocation sloc)
        Deprecated. this is not valid anymore as there can be more than one Area Trigger.
        Try to remove Area Trigger at given location.
        Parameters:
        sloc -
        Returns:
        false if no area found at location; true if deleted
